result.execSummary:
The defendant Odell Broadway III was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Court ordered defendant to provide a DNA sample, and pay all MANDATORY court costs, fees, surcharges, and assessments by 2/24/2016. Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.

Consecutive to: To any other sentence with credit for 1 day time served. Huber privileges pursuant to Sec. 303.08 Wis Stats to apply for work.
Report in date: Saturday, March 7, 2015 by noon.
If defendant fails to report, all community access is cancelled.

Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess any gun or other firearms.
Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended, and may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Odell Broadway III

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
FAILURE TO REPORT COMMITMENT REFERRAL:
.
Failure to Report Commitment Referral received from the HOC and filed this date.  This case is assigned and forwarded to Judge Fiorenza, Br 3, for review. os

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor.  Karl P. Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant. 

The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 20 DAYS in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence with credit for 1 day time served.  Huber privileges pursuant to Sec. 303.08 Wis. Stats to apply for work.

Report in Date:  Saturday, March 7, 2015 by noon.
If defendant fails to report, all community access is cancelled.

Court ordered defendant to provide a DNA, and pay all MANDATORY COURT costs, fees, surcharges, and assessments by 2/24/2016.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.  

Received and filed:
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief;
Sentencing Referral Form;
Pretrial Incarceration Credit.  aw

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor.  Karl P. Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for sentencing.  Court is in trial.  Case adjourned for sentencing on 2/24/2015 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  aw  Sentencing hearing scheduled for February 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor.  Karl P. Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty.  Judgment of conviction entered.
  
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess any gun or other firearms. 
Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended, and may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.  

Court also advises defendant if he is not a citizen of the United States of America, that upon a plea of guilty or no contest for this offense, he could be deported, excluded from admission to his country, or denied naturalization under federal law.  
Court advised that the defendant will have to provide a DNA sample, to the Wisconsin State Crime Laboratory for DNA testing.
Case adjourned for sentencing on 1/14/2015 at 1:30 pm, branch 3. 
Ineligible Voting Notice and Acknowledgement, received and filed.  aw
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 14, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor.  Karl P. Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case scheduled for plea and sentencing.  Case adjourned for plea and sentencing on 10/28/2014 at 1:30 pm, branch 3.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  aw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Odell Broadway III
Current: 2540 N. 52nd Street, Milwaukee, WI 53210 United States  (Effective: 08-28-2014)
Prior: 1120 W Chambers, Lower, Milwaukee, WI 53206 United States

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria L Taylor.  Karl P Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel has no motions to be filed.  Case adjourned for plea and sentencing on 8/28/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  aw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 28, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria L Taylor.  Dennis P Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Karl Hayes.
Defense counsel requests a new date to review discovery with client.  Discovery was sent to the wrong address.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 6/9/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 9, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria L Taylor.  Karl P Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defense counsel needs to go over discovery with client.  Case adjourned for scheduling conference on 5/29/2014 at 8:30 am, branch 3.  Court reminds defendant to not use or possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription.  aw  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 29, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Fiorenza, Branch 03.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant plead not guilty.

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria L Taylor.  Paul Hauer for Karl P Hayes appeared for the State of Wisconsin. eam
 Request for Substitution of Judge received and filed.  Court consented to substitution against Judge Konkol, Br. 44.  Parties are advised the Clerk of Circuit Court reassigned case pursuant to current court rules to Judge Fiorenza, Br. 3.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 6, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Odell Broadway III
Current: 1120 W Chambers, Lower, Milwaukee, WI 53206 United States  (Effective: 04-09-2014)
Prior: 1825 West Meinecke Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Court ordered arrest warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

The Court ordered no use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Odell Broadway in court with attorney Valeria Lenise Taylor.  Carole R. Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Konkol, Branch 44.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 17, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
